meanings.def: a machine for printing text on paper, especially one connected to a computer
examples: Connect the printer to your PC with a printer cable.
The printer has run off 2 000 copies of the leaflet.
The printer won't print for some reason.
You can print to any networked printer in the building.

meanings.def: a person or a company whose job is printing books, etc.
a place where books, etc. are printed
